description:
Brandish Î¼ is part of the Alvarez Empire and a former member of the Spriggan 12, the protection guard of Emperor Spriggan. She also led her own team inside the Imperial Army, the Brandish Squad. Knowingly able to bring a nation to its knees, she garnered the epithet Nation Destroyer.
Source: Fairy Tail Wiki
name: Brandish Mu
